## Checklist

- [ ] Frontmatter includes all required fields (title, slug, category, version, description, whenToUse, tags, targetModels, contextFields)
- [ ] Slug is lowercase alphanumeric with hyphens only
- [ ] Category is one of: `before-you-code`, `after-code-generation`, `product-decisions`
- [ ] Prompt tested with at least one AI tool (Claude, GPT-4, or Gemini)
- [ ] No secrets, API keys, or credentials in prompt content
- [ ] Context fields defined with id, label, placeholder, required, and type
